title: Bleach 1-279 [480p][Dual-Audio] Movies 1-4 [720p][DD5.1][Dual-Au
description:
No information as to when Box Set 20 will be released so it seems like a good time to merge all my Bleach torrents into one.


--SERIES--
Earlier episodes have some bad interlacing in the intros and credits, it gets better as the series goes. There should be no interlacing on the newest Box Sets. I am sure there is a name for it when an encoder learns something new and wishes he could re-do all previous work.

--MOVIES--
Movies are 720p because the Blu-rays are 720p up-scales. I checked some screens myself from a untouched Blu-ray and they are virtually identical. Also these are not my encodes. I re-muxed making English default and encoded the audio from 24bit FLAC (if I remember correctly) to 16bit AC3.
